headline: NVIDIA marches toward $5 trillion valuation as CEO Haung delivers at GTC
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of AI-powerhouse NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) surged 5% Tuesday to over $200 per share for the first time after CEO Jensen Huang’s keynote address at the semi-annual GTC conference, where he downplayed any concern over an AI bubble. The company’s valuation is now nearing $5 trillion.

The company’s valuation is now nearing $5 trillion.

headline: How Will Services, Mac and iPad Fare in Apple's Q4 Earnings?
summary: AAPL's fiscal Q4 results are set to shine on strong Services and Mac growth, even as iPad sales face a modest decline.

headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- ADCOLOR/
summary: ADCOLOR, the premier organization dedicated to championing community and inclusion in the creative industries, today announced key details for its highly anticipated ADCOLOR 2025 event, taking place November 11–14, 2025 at Disney's Coronado Springs Resort in Orlando, Florida.

headline: Ex-Disney Executive Wants to Be Faster and More Frugal Than Hollywood Studios
summary: Sean Bailey’s new venture pursues Silicon Valley partnerships to speed up TV and movie making and reduce costs.

headline: Is Disney’s (DIS) Rising Streaming Churn and Potential Blackouts Altering the Investment Case?
summary: In recent days, Disney reported the loss of about 7 million Disney+ and Hulu subscribers following the suspension of Jimmy Kimmel’s show, and has warned of a possible blackout for networks like ESPN and ABC on YouTube TV due to ongoing distribution negotiations. This combination of heightened subscriber churn and the risk of a major content blackout spotlights mounting pressure on Disney’s streaming and media businesses at a pivotal time for its direct-to-consumer growth. We'll examine how...

headline: Sony's Beyond Sports and ESPN Expand Collaboration to Bring Additional Animated Telecasts to NFL, NHL, NBA, and WNBA Fans in 2025/26 season, starting with Monsters Funday Football
summary: Sony's Beyond Sports and ESPN© are excited to strengthen their collaboration with a new agreement focused on the advancement of innovative fan engagement technologies. The partnership will be on full display Monday, Dec 8 during the Monday Night Football game between the Philadelphia Eagles and Los Angeles Chargers with the debut of the Monsters Funday Football telecast; a collaboration between Sony's Beyond Sports, NFL, ESPN, Disney and Pixar©.

headline: Disney and Formula 1® Collaboration to Launch at Las Vegas Grand Prix with Spectacular Show at the Fountains of Bellagio
summary: Disney and Formula 1® announced today their highly anticipated collaboration will kick off at the Las Vegas Grand Prix this November. As revealed in May, this exciting global relationship will "fuel the magic" for fans by blending world-class sports with Disney's iconic storytelling and an exclusive Formula 1 merchandise line.
